## tokenize() function

Tokenize a CSS string into a list of tokens.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function tokenize(input: {
    css: {
        valueOf(): string;
    };
    unicodeRangesAllowed?: boolean;
}, options?: {
    onParseError?: (error: ParseError) => void;
}): Array<CSSToken>;
```
